bg@duskhorizon.display:name: Dusk Horizon
bg@duskhorizon.bg: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(128,0,0,1) 0%, rgba(204,85,0,0.7) 20%, rgba(255,140,0,0.6) 45%, rgba(160,90,160,0.5) 65%, rgba(60,60,120,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent 60%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, rgba(255,255,255,0.05), transparent 70%)
